lines.gurmukhi: jYsy sir sirqw skl mY smuMdR bfo; myr mY sumyr bfo jgqu bKwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as in the world, the sea is considered biggest among the lakes, rivers etc.; and Sumer mountain amongst all the mountains.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs pRkwr qlwvwˆ ndIAwˆ ivKy sBnwˆ ivcoˆ smuMdR vfw hY, Aqy prbqwˆ ivcoˆ jgq Br sumyr prbq nUM vfw AwKdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qrvr ibKY jYsy cMdn ibrKu bfo; Dwqu mY knk Aiq auqm kY mwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a sandalwood tree and gold is considered supreme amongst the trees and metals respectively.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ibrCwˆ ivcoˆ ijs Bwˆq cMnx dw ibrC vfw sRySt hY qy DwqUAwˆ ivcoˆ sony nUM AqI auqm kr ky mMinAw jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: pMCIAn mY hMs imRg rwjn mY swrdUl; rwgn mY isrIrwgu pwrs pKwn hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as swan is supreme amongst the birds, the lion amongst the feline family, Sri Rag amongst the mode of singing and philosopher-stone among the stones.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pMCIAwˆ ivcoˆ hMs, imRg icqRy, lgV, Syr Awid ivcoˆ swrdUl isG kysrI Syr Aru rwgwˆ ivcoˆ isrI rwg qy p`Qrwˆ ivcoˆ pwrs vfw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: igAwnn mY igAwnu Aru iDAwnn mY iDAwn gur; skl Drm mY igRhsqu pRDwn hY [376[

Unknown.translation: Just as the knowledge imparted by the True Guru is supreme of all knowledge, and concentration of mind on True Guru is superb, so is the family life ideal and superior of all the religions (ways of life).  (376)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: lOikk, SwsiqRk vw byidk Awid smUh gÎwnwˆ ivcoˆ gurU gÎwn, qQw sUrj cMdRAwid dyv DÎwnwˆ ivcoˆ gurU ieSt dyv dw DÎwn sRySt huMdw hY, qIkUM hI smUh Drmwˆ ivcoˆ igRhsQ Drm pRDwn muKÎ AqÎMq auqm hY ]376]
